name: apollo-server-lambda-demo
description: Demo of apollo-server-lambda to run a serverless graphql API

scripts.setup-dynamodb: docker-compose -f docker-compose-localstack.yaml up -d && sleep 2 && yarn create-local-table:goals
scripts.cf:package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template-prod.yaml --output-template-file  cf-template.yaml --s3-bucket waes-techtalk-graphql-free-cf-template
scripts.cf:deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file cf-template.yaml --stack-name graphql-free-prod --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM

author: Yuri Oliveira
